content.rendered:
Before & After Photos
of Avéli® Cellulite Treatments

See before and after results of an Avéli® cellulite treatement. Avéli® is designed to reduce the appearance of cellulite in the buttocks and thighs.

Avéli® named “Best Minimally Invasive Cellulite Treatment.”

Avéli® delivers a long-term reduction in the appearance of cellulite in the buttocks and thighs, with smoother skin that is visible shortly after a single in-office procedure once swelling and bruising subsides.1,4

Honest Results Only

Avéli treats cellulite dimples

Avéli does not treat laxity

Avéli does not treat fat

Find a Provider

Experience the Avéli® Difference

Find a provider in your area.

Search Now

@graph.name: Before & After Photos of Avéli Cellulite Treatments
@graph.description: See the result of an Avéli cellulite treatement with untouched before and after photos of real women. Avéli is designed to reduce the appearance of cellulite. Honest results only.

@graph.caption: A side-by-side comparison of a woman's behind, wearing leggings. The "Before" shows a woman with cellulite dimples, and the "After 3 Months" shows a woman smooth and free of cellulite.
